channel.title: WebClient Error - Freezing on login?
channel.description:
How come when me/my players log in, they freeze as soon as they do? This only happens when they use the webclient, however...
I've tried alot of things, but when you run the client by running the .Java files, it works perfectly... could someone tell me what i'm doing wrong?

item.title: WebClient Error - Freezing on login?
item.dc:creator: @ProjectDiabolus ProjectDiabolus
item.description:
@ProjectDiabolus wrote:

God you’re retarded. You know what I mean, and i’m not stupid, and yes the god damn webclient is signed.

Read full topic

item.title: WebClient Error - Freezing on login?
item.dc:creator: @adamp40 adamp40
item.description:
@adamp40 wrote:

ProjectDiabolus:

I’ve tried alot of things, but when you run the client by running the .Java files, it works perfectly… could someone tell me what i’m doing wrong?

You cannot run stuff using *.java files the only files you can use is *.class

Make sure you sign your jar for your webclient or it will not work

Read full topic
